com.iciql

Class DbUpgrader.DefaultDbUpgrader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iciql.DbUpgrader.DefaultDbUpgrader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbUpgrader
    Enclosing interface:
    DbUpgrader

    public static class DbUpgrader.DefaultDbUpgrader
extends java.lang.Object
implements DbUpgrader
    The default database upgrader. It throws runtime exception instead of handling upgrade requests.

    • Method Detail

      • upgradeDatabase

        public boolean upgradeDatabase(Db db,
                      int fromVersion,
                      int toVersion)
        Description copied from interface: DbUpgrader
        Defines method interface to handle database upgrades. This method is only called if your DbUpgrader implementation is annotated with IQDatabase.
        Specified by:
        upgradeDatabase in interface DbUpgrader
        Parameters:
        db - the database
        fromVersion - the old version
        toVersion - the new version
        Returns:
        true for successful upgrade. If the upgrade is successful, the version registry is automatically updated.

      • upgradeTable

        public boolean upgradeTable(Db db,
                   java.lang.String schema,
                   java.lang.String table,
                   int fromVersion,
                   int toVersion)
        Description copied from interface: DbUpgrader
        Defines method interface to handle table upgrades.
        Specified by:
        upgradeTable in interface DbUpgrader
        Parameters:
        db - the database
        schema - the schema
        table - the table
        fromVersion - the old version
        toVersion - the new version
        Returns:
        true for successful upgrade. If the upgrade is successful, the version registry is automatically updated.
